name: Nebula (itch) (Screaming Idiots)
description:
Our submission for the #scorejam!

An arena rogue-like where you try to survive as long as possible!

Your score is measured by how many ships you destroyed!

Absorb your enemies' missiles just to send them right back at them! 



Protect your little buddy so you can devour more!

Credits:

Font:  Foundation Titles Hand

Music: 

Menu - Pablo Perez - Beyond 

In Game - Matthew Pablo - Orbital Colossus

Here you can find some Screenshots and Logos to use in Thumbnails.
